### CLIP MLP Block

#### Description

Feed-forward network with configurable activation

#### Arguments

- **`in_dim`**: Input dimension
- **`hidden_dim`**: Hidden dimension
- **`gelu_type`**: GELU variant: "tanh" (tanh approximation), "quick" (QuickGELU), "exact" (standard GELU)
